00001 #include <ip.h>

00003 rn_link *
00004 getroute(ip_state * state, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00005 {
00006         rn_machine      *me = rn_getmachine(lp->id);
00007         rn_link         *link = NULL;
00008 
00009         //int            next_hop = -1;
00010 
00011         /*
00012          * Get the next_hop destination from the forwarding table 
00013          * for this IP packet.
00014          */
00015         if(msg->src == lp->id && me->nlinks == 1)
00016                 link = me->link;
00017         else if(NULL == (link = ip_route(me, msg)))
00018                 link = rn_getlink(me, msg->dst);
00019 
00020         if(NULL == link)
00021         {
00022                 state->stats->s_nnet_failures++;
00023                 ip_packet_drop(state, msg, lp);
00024 
00025                 return NULL;
00026         }
00027 
00028         return link;
00029 }

00031 tw_event        *
00032 forward(ip_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00033 {
00034         //tw_memory     *b;
00035         tw_event        *e;
00036         tw_stime         ts;
00037 
00038         rn_link         *l;
00039 
00040         //ip_message    *ip;
00041 
00042         ts = 0.0;
00043         state->stats->s_nforward++;
00044 
00045         if(NULL == (l = getroute(state, msg, lp)))
00046                 return NULL;
00047 
00048         //b = tw_memory_alloc(lp, g_ip_fd);
00049 
00050         //ip = tw_memory_data(b);
00051         //ip->rc_link = l;
00052         //ip->rc_lastsent = l->last_sent;
00053 
00054         if(tw_now(lp) > l->last_sent)
00055                 l->last_sent = tw_now(lp);
00056         else
00057                 ts = l->last_sent - tw_now(lp);
00058 
00059         l->last_sent += (msg->size) / l->bandwidth;
00060         ts += ((msg->size) / l->bandwidth) + l->delay;
00061 
00062         //l->avg_delay += ts;
00063         l->avg_delay += (msg->size);
00064 
00065         e = rn_event_new(l->addr, ts, lp, DOWNSTREAM, msg->size);
00066         //tw_event_memory_set(e, b, g_ip_fd);
00067 
00068         if((bf->c31 = (e == lp->pe->abort_event && e->recv_ts <= g_tw_ts_end)))
00069         {
00070                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Got abort event ...");
00071                 state->stats->s_nnet_failures++;
00072                 msg->ttl++;
00073         }
00074 
00075 #if VERIFY_IP
00076         printf("\t\t%lld IP FWD: to %lld at ts %lf (bw %lf del %lf)\n", 
00077                 lp->id, l->addr, e->recv_ts, l->bandwidth, l->delay);
00078 #endif
00079 
00080         return e;
00081 }

00083 void
00084 ip_downstream_source(ip_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00085 {
00086         tw_event        *e;
00087 
00088         msg->size += g_ip_header;
00089 
00090         if(NULL != (e = forward(state, bf, msg, lp)))
00091                 rn_event_send(e);
00092 }
00093 
00094 void
00095 ip_downstream_forward(ip_state * state, tw_bf * bf, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00096 {
00097         tw_event        *e;
00098 
00099         rn_message      *m;
00100 
00101         if(--msg->ttl == 0)
00102         {
00103                 state->stats->s_ndropped_ttl++;
00104                 ip_packet_drop(state, msg, lp);
00105                 return;
00106         }
00107 
00108         if(NULL == (e = forward(state, bf, msg, lp)))
00109                 return;
00110 
00111         // TODO: Move this logic into rn_event_send
00112 
00113         if(e == lp->pe->abort_event)
00114         {
00115                 printf("got abort event in IP\n");
00116                 rn_event_send(e);
00117                 return;
00118         }
00119 
00120         // If I was not the destination, then must be forwarding this pkt
00121         if(!lp->pe->cur_event->memory)
00122                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "No membuf on forward event!");
00123 
00124         //if(lp->cur_event->memory && e->memory->next && !e->state.b.abort)
00125         if(lp->pe->cur_event->memory && e->memory && e != lp->pe->abort_event)
00126                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unable to forward membufs!");
00127 
00128         e->memory = lp->pe->cur_event->memory;
00129         lp->pe->cur_event->memory = NULL;
00130 
00131         // fixup the message source
00132         m = tw_event_data(e);
00133 
00134         m->src = msg->src;
00135         m->dst = msg->dst;
00136         m->port = msg->port;
00137         m->ttl = msg->ttl;
00138 
00139         rn_event_send(e);
00140 }
